attributes.action: DEFRA KEEP RSPCA AWAY FROM MY PRIVATE PROPERTY I AM AN ANIMAL LOVER
attributes.additional_details: Home office you are to keep the charity registration number 219099 the RSPCA away from private property and are to get the police educated that the RSPCA are a registered charity and have no powers. The RSPCA is passing false information to the police which the police take for granted and have not verified any information and iand the police have NO EDUCATION obviously on the laws of Britain The RSPCA is a CHARITY registration number 219099. Keep all RSPCA personnel away from private property as they jump fencing 5 foot tall demand entry then keep you detained threaten you and steal animal lover pets. Animal lovers are being inflicted with mental trauma causing death and serious ill health .The RSPCA are not the authorities to control the AWA 2006 act in fact any owning an animal is obviously an animal lover. You are to get control of this country as you should have the RSPCA BACK off and get your police force educated
